law.catch_line: The powers granted to political subdivisions by Part III of this subtitle are supplementary to any o...

text.section: The powers granted to political subdivisions by Part III of this subtitle are supplementary to any other powers of the political subdivisions.

This section does not:
Invalidate any procedures initiated or completed by any political subdivision before June 1, 1972; or
Limit or modify any provision of any general or local law effective before June 1, 1972.
